title: cardDecker
description: Randomly draw cards from a standard deck of 52 poker-style playing cards. This 52-card pack includes 4 suites clubs (♣), diamonds (♦), hearts (♥) and spades (♠ (Fifty-two playing cards in four suits: hearts, spades, clubs, diamonds, with face values of Ace, 2-10, Jack, Queen, and King.) and 13 ranks of which are .Ace, Jack, Queen, King and numbers two to ten
